name: pnp-sp-fx-aces-react-seach-faq
title: FAQ Search Adaptive Card Extension
shortDescription: The FAQ Search Adaptive Card Extension for SharePoint Framework (SPFx) is designed to display and manage frequently asked questions (FAQs) in a user-friendly interface.
longDescription: The FAQ Search Adaptive Card Extension for SharePoint Framework (SPFx) is designed to display and manage frequently asked questions (FAQs) in a user-friendly interface.

references.name: Viva Connections Extensibility guidance
references.description: Adaptive Card Extensions are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page.
